document_title: Benign kidney tumors: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_content:
Recognizing the risk factors that contribute to kidney tumors can help you build a scientific, healthy lifestyle, contributing to reducing the risk of cancer. According to Urology and Nephrology experts, below are the best ways to prevent kidney tumors:
Limit and make efforts to completely stop using tobacco and stay away from cigarette smoke; Build a healthy, balanced diet by:; Limit your intake of processed meats; Adopt diets that focus on plant-based foods, lean protein and healthy fats; Avoid drinking alcohol or drink in moderation; Maintain a reasonable weight by increasing physical activity for at least 30 minutes/day; Shield your body from the sun; Get vaccinated against viral infections that can lead to kidney cancer, such as hepatitis B and HPV.; Do not use medicine, especially prescription medicine, without a doctor's prescription; Pay attention to your health and follow a regular health care schedule to screen for types of cancer promptly and bring high treatment effectiveness.
Vaccination against hepatitis B and HPV is one of the effective measures to prevent kidney tumors.
